rows.label: qst003501_msg0001
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Give it back! Give it back, Karze!!

rows.label: qst003501_msg0002
rows.name:
My dad salvaged that for
me! It's my treasure!

rows.label: qst003501_msg0003
rows.name:
Hmph... Salvaged? Where
did he salvage it from?

rows.label: qst003501_msg0004
rows.name: I-in the relay base...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0005
rows.name: Oh, inside the base?

rows.label: qst003501_msg0006
rows.name:
Then this is Superbia's property...
which makes it mine, doesn't it?

rows.label: qst003501_msg0007
rows.name:
That's not... Salvaged goods
belong to the salvager...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0008
rows.name:
So noisy... Then go get
another one just like it.

rows.label: qst003501_msg0009
rows.name:
If you do that, I might
give this one back.

rows.label: qst003501_msg0010
rows.name: That's impossible... I can't...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0011
rows.name: Then I can't give it back.

rows.label: qst003501_msg0012
rows.name: *sob*... Dad...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0013
rows.name:
The Morph Orb Dad gave me...
I can't get it back...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0014
rows.name:
My dad... he was trying
to become a Driver...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0015
rows.name:
He said if he became a Driver,
life would be easier than
growing vegetables...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0016
rows.name:
But there was so much blood... and
he stopped moving... *hic* *sob*...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0017
rows.name:
So... I can't ask my dad to
get me another Morph Orb...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0018
rows.name: It was all I had to remember him by...

rows.label: qst003501_msg0019
rows.name: You'll salvage one for me? Thank you!

rows.label: qst003501_msg0020
rows.name:
My dad said he salvaged it
inside the relay base.

rows.label: qst003501_msg0021
rows.name:
But... I wonder if you can
even get inside the base...
